channel.title: Is this command for donators right?

item.title: Is this command for donators right?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() >= 5 && playerRights == 5) {
    String text = command.substring(5);
    yell("[DONOR] " + playerName + "says :" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1).toLowerCase());
}

Sorry. I had missed a quotation mark in my last post. This should work.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this command for donators right?

item.title: Is this command for donators right?
item.dc:creator: @lmfaoown lmfaoown
item.description:
@lmfaoown wrote:

i used this and no compile errors. Before i restart the server will this work?

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() >= 8 && playerRights == 5) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[DONOR] “+playerName+” says" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1).toLowerCase());
}

Read full topic
item.source: Is this command for donators right?

item.title: Is this command for donators right?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:7, topic:264516”]Then the command must be equal to five characters in length. That doesn’t make much sense.
Use this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() >= 5 && playerRights == 5) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[DONOR] + playerName + "says :" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1).toLowerCase()); } [/quote]He might not have the yell void

Read full topic

item.title: Is this command for donators right?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Then the command must be equal to five characters in length. That doesn’t make much sense.
Use this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() >= 5 && playerRights == 5) {
    String text = command.substring(5);
    yell("[DONOR] + playerName + "says :" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1).toLowerCase());
}

item.title: Is this command for donators right?

  if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 1) {
		String text = command.substring(8);
			yell("[DONATOR] +playername+ say's   " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}
